title: Can IGNOU admission forms be submitted at the study centres? - Quora

response.answer_text: No admission forms are to be submitted at the regional centers only with the demand draft for fees. I don't know( it's been a long time since I have completed my course) but please check if now it is possible to submit it online. It will be more convenient for you. I hope this helps.

No you cannot and without taking admission first how can you know which is your study centre. Study centre is assigned after the confirmation of your admission. You can fill the application form online or visit your nearest regional centre of IGNOU for the details of IGNOU regional centre you can visit the official website. Hope it helps

No, you can’t submit the admission form at study centre. But you can submit it at your corresponding Regional Centre(RC) as well as you can fill admission form online for your choice of study centre. Thankyou.
A2A Ignou admission forms are probably submitted online only. But if its late and admissions are closed then you should contact your nearby regional center. Aaradhana:)
